src.client: path for superkaola to scan client-entry js, relative to current path
src.server: path for superkaola to scan server-entry js, relative to current path

js.local: dev build output path, should be assigned if use dll

css.src: path for superkaola to scan entry css
css.local: default to be same with js
css.build: default to be same with js

build.dllModules: path to the dll modules entry file

extra.webpackConfig: path to project specific webpack config
extra.postcssConfig: path to project specific postcss config
extra.statsDir: directory to store stats.json, should be assigned if analying bundle
